@Call_of_Duty wrote:

Idiot, no offense, but this is sigged. public class Herblore is naming the file. Compiling creates the class files, aka, translating english to bytecode.

item.title: .class files

item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“kaelen92, post:1, topic:202616”]I made a new handler and it has this at the top

public class Herblore {

Isn’t that supposed to automatically make a .class file for you in your server folder?
Well it hasn’t made one and I don’t know why, explanation would be great.
Also if there’s any way to view a class file if someone could tell me :)[/quote]handler

item.title: .class files
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

I made a new handler and it has this at the top

public class Herblore {

Isn’t that supposed to automatically make a .class file for you in your server folder?
Well it hasn’t made one and I don’t know why, explanation would be great.

I get this error when I try to compile:

[code]Please Wait…
client.java:19125: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Slot
location: class client
server.herblore.IDherb(playerId, ItemID, Slot);
^
client.java:19264: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable useWith
location: class client
if (useWith == 227 || itemUsed == 227) {
^
client.java:19264: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemUsed
location: class client
if (useWith == 227 || itemUsed == 227) {
^
client.java:19265: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemUsed
location: class client
server.herblore.unfpot(playerId, itemUsed, useWi
th);
^
client.java:19265: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable useWith
location: class client
server.herblore.unfpot(playerId, itemUsed, useWi
th);
^
client.java:19267: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable useWith
location: class client
if (server.herblore.isunfpot(useWith) || server.
herblore.isunfpot(itemUsed)) {
^
client.java:19267: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemUsed
location: class client
if (server.herblore.isunfpot(useWith) || server.
herblore.isunfpot(itemUsed)) {

              ^

client.java:19268: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemUsed
location: class client
server.herblore.finishpot(playerId, itemUsed, us
eWith);
^
client.java:19268: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable useWith
location: class client
server.herblore.finishpot(playerId, itemUsed, us
eWith);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
[/code]
Also if there’s any way to view a class file if someone could tell me
